com.audiofetch.afaudiolib.bll.colleagues

Class NativeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audiofetch.afaudiolib.bll.colleagues.base.ControllerBase
      • com.audiofetch.afaudiolib.bll.colleagues.NativeController

  • public class NativeController
extends ControllerBase
    Wraps the interface to the native JNI methods and the apb communications in general

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  NativeController.OnDiscoveryFinishedListener
      This is the callback for when the native discovery code has found all apbs.

        public static void nativeDiscoveryCallback(java.lang.String apbHostJsonArray)
